jd: From: Atiya, Netonics inc atiya.s@netonicsinc.com Reply to: atiya.s@netonicsinc.com Job Title: Product Analyst or Business Analyst With Retail Domain EXPNO OPT CPT AND H-1BLOCAL TO MA ONLYLocation: Marlborough, MA 01752– Local only What you’ll doThe Loss Prevention (LP) Global Solution Delivery Team is responsible for managing solutions and technology that delivers capabilities to keep our associates and customers safe, preserve company assets, and provide business value.What you’ll needOur team is looking for people with a passion for delivering solutions, intellectual curiosity, and willingness to try new things. We are a collaborative culture and looking for somebody who enjoys meeting with and learning about how technology solves problems for our retail business.Key Responsibilities• Work to determine detailed requirements from key stakeholders for the team• Contribute to the Loss Prevention team’s backlog refinement, including user story point estimation and testing considerations• Articulate context around requirements and solutions, and work to build consensus within a stakeholder group• Work with and support the product team to achieve iteration goals and objectives• Ensure the functional integrity of the product/solutionMinimum Qualifications (Requirements)• 5-10 years’ experience as a Product Analyst or Business Analyst• Jira and Confluence (required)• Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills• Presentation skills• Analytical skills• Ability to drive conversations with cross-functional teamsPreferred Qualifications• 1-3 years’ experience SAFe framework/Agile delivery method knowledge• Experience in the Loss Prevention field• Knowledge and experience with Loss Prevention applicationso Genetec, Appriss or other Loss prevention software platforms• Familiarity with the retail industry & best practices• Experience working with vendors and 3rd party solutions• Experience working in a retail environment is desirable
